name: Diamond
description: A valuable currency that circulates throughout Phantasia Mountain, offering many unique items.

name: Forging Commemorative Coin
description: Obtained from Champion Expedition or by dismantling UR equipment. Use at the Gear Store to exchange for rare items.

name: Glory Coins
description: A top-tier currency earned in the Realm Clash. Can be exchanged for rare resources.

name: Godking Apex Coin
description: A top-tier Currency earned in Godking Clash that's exchangeable for rare resources.

name: Godking Coin
description: Currency earned in Godking Clash that's exchangeable for rare resources.

name: Treasure Essence
description: Obtained through Treasure Dismantling. Exchange for treasures at the Treasure Store.

name: Voucher
description: A mysterious voucher from another world that can replace real currency for purchases.

name: Ring of Inspiration
description: An ancient inscription imbued with a god's forging inspiration. Use it to unlock Runes for use in Rune Summon.

name: Arena Coins
description: Arena Currency is awarded to honor participants and is exchangeable for rare resources in the Arena Store.

name: Cloud Blossom
description: The dreamy little flower grows exclusively on mysterious floating islands, exchangeable for rare items at the Cloudborne Store.

name: Divine Coin
description: A peculiar Currency scattered throughout the Rift of the Divine Realm that's exchangeable for rare resources at the Divine Realm Store

name: Dragonbreath Seed
description: A dragon seed containing dormant power - while its radiance may be dim now, it shall regain its brilliance one day. Exchange it at the Magic Store for rare resources.

name: Guild Coin
description: Guild Currency that's exchangeable for rare resources at the Guild Store.

name: Honor Insignia
description: Advanced Arena Currency is awarded to participants based on seasonal rank performance. It can be exchanged for rare resources in the Advanced Store.

name: Triumphant Medal
description: Medals obtained in the Points League gameplay can be exchanged for rare resources in the League Store.

name: Friendship Points
description: A testament to the friendship between adventure partners. Can be used to exchange for rare items in the Friendship Store.

name: Gold
description: The most common form of currency on Phantasia Mountain.

name: Slime Goo
description: Slime goo clinging to Luminaries Obtained by dismantling N Luminaries, and can be exchanged for various rare resources.

name: Amber Necklace
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 100 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Elemental Echo faction. *"L-Let me out! I've been trapped in here for a hundred thousand years!"*

name: Black Lotus
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 100 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Illusion Veil faction. *"Extinct. Priceless."*

name: Lilac and Gooseberry
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 100 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Arcane Wisdom faction. *"A fragrance flavored by a certain female warlock."*

name: Luxury Tea Set
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 150 points. *"Elegant, truly elegant!"*

name: Soul Bell
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 100 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Otherworld Return faction. *"Shake it every day, and the room comes to life."*

name: Stained Glass Window Decoration
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 100 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Sanctum Glory faction. *"The Angel is watching over you."*

name: Treant Sapling
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 100 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Wild Spirit faction. *"Water daily, grow quickly!"*

name: Forbidden Scroll
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 50 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Illusion Veil faction. *"If you gaze into the abyss, the abyss gazes into you."*

name: Graveyard Lily
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 50 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Otherworld Return faction. *"Lily of the valley, blooming shy and sweet."*

name: Griffin Doll
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 50 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Sanctum Glory faction. *"Limited quantity â€” act fast!"*

name: Grilled Steak
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 75 points. *"The Moo Rights Association strongly objects to this gift!"*

name: Obsidian Arrowhead
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 50 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Elemental Echo faction. *"One Cloudpiercer through the clouds, thousands of troops heed the call."*

name: Potion Class Notes
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 50 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Arcane Wisdom faction. *"So many weird squiggles... Can't read a thing."*

name: Ring Casting Mold
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 50 points. Especially favored by Luminaries of the Wild Spirit faction. *"With this, you can craft the Ring of Dominion!"*

name: A Knight's Tale
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 20 points. Especially favored by Luminaries whose main faction is Sanctum Glory. *"Read it and become a Dragonslayer!"*

name: Banquet Cake
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 30 points. *"You gotta eat well to have the energy to lose weight!"*

name: Coral Ornament
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 20 points. Especially favored by Luminaries whose main faction is Elemental Echo. *"It would look better underwater."*

name: Fairy Dust
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 20 points. Especially favored by Luminaries whose main faction is Wild Spirit. *"Ah, ah... Achoo!"*

name: Ink and Quill
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 20 points. Especially favored by Luminaries whose main faction is Arcane Wisdom. *"Works best when used with Potion Class Notes."*

name: Preservative
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 20 points. Especially favored by Luminaries whose main faction is Otherworld Return. *"Don't ask why I look so young, it's the preservatives."*

name: Rotten Branch
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 20 points. Especially favored by Luminaries whose main faction is Illusion Veil. *"Within corruption lies the power of the World Tree."*

name: Apple
description: Gifting to a Luminary increases Affection by 15 points. *"It won't make you lose consciousness."*

name: Exploration Guide
description: Using this in Champion Expedition grants 3 Veteran Emblems.

name: Feather of Revelation
description: A sacred feather imbued with Blessing exchangeable for 1 Trial Emblem during the Trial of Warborn Goddess.

name: Advanced Entry Ticket
description: Tickets for challenging opponents in the Advanced Points Match. In the Points League, the higher your rank, the more purcahses can be made daily.

name: Aurora Crystal
description: Contains immense Energy from the origin of life. An Advanced Material for Artifact Advancement.

name: Aurora Dust
description: Crystal dust, the product of years of alchemical refinement. A Common Material use for Treasure Advancement.

name: Divine Crystal
description: A gem radiant as a rainbow, flowing with divine light. Used to enhance a Luminary's Divinity.

name: Dragonblood
description: The rare blood of ancient dragons. Can be used in Wyrm Star Upgrade.

name: Highwyrm EXP
description: Used to increase Dragon level.

name: Primal Amber
description: An amber crystal containing ancient Luminary memories. Unlocks advanced classes.

name: Starlight Sigil
description: A Starshine Mark with flowing light, used to upgrade the Stellar Power level of dragons.

name: Wyrm Essence
description: The Essence crystallized from an Ancient Wyrm's condensed power serves as an advanced material for Luminary breakthroughs.

name: Dragonfire
description: An eternal flame that enhances the Dragon Roar effect.

name: Leaf of the World Tree
description: The sacred leaf veins contain ancient magical imprints. Used for Wyrm Ascend Tier advancement.

name: Luminary EXP
description: Essence crystallized from traces of Luminaries, used to increase a Luminary's Level.

name: Mythic Summoning Ticket
description: A ticket crystallized from Luminary memories within the World Tree, serving as a soul link to channel Luminaries. Can be used for Mythical Summons.

name: Fate Elixir
description: A legendary alchemical potion said to reshape the very essence of matter. Those who find it can change the world. Can be used for Howlkin Refinement.

name: Fate Horn
description: A fated horn that can awaken the World Serpent. Can be used in Limited Time Offer Treasure Hunts.

name: Fated Dragon Crystal
description: An azure crystal containing the Memory of an ancient Wyrm. Upon activation, it grants powerful Wyrmspells. Can be used in Magic Limited Summoning.

name: Fated Summoning Ticket
description: A ticket crystallized from Luminary memories within the World Tree, serving as a soul link to channel Luminaries. Can be used for Limited Summons.

name: Golden Horn
description: A golden horn that can awaken the World Serpent. Can be used in Treasure Hunts.

name: Legacy Dragon Crystal
description: An azure crystal containing the Memory of an ancient Wyrm. Upon activation, it unlocks powerful Wyrmspells. Can be used in Magic Summoning.

name: Soul Elixir
description: Soul essence extracted from pure souls. Regarded across the land as a forbidden alchemical potion. Can be used for Howlkin Refinement.

name: Summoning Ticket
description: A ticket crystallized from Luminary memories within the World Tree, serving as a soul link to channel Luminaries. Can be used for Luminary Summons.

name: Wishing Lily
description: A lily of the valley blooming where the Warborn Goddess descended, infused with a Sacred Blessing, usable in Wish Summon.

name: Mercury Potion
description: A mercury potion extracted through alchemy that emits a faint azure glow. Can be used for Howlkin Refinement.

name: 5-Star Luminary Shards
description: Collect 60 Shards to summon an SSR or SSR+ Luminary.

name: SSR Luminary Shards
description: Collect 60 Shards to summon an SSR Luminary.

name: Rune Shards
description: Can be exchanged for any Class or Faction Oath Rune at a ratio of 5 to 1.

name: SR Luminary Shards
description: Collect 60 Shards to summon an SR Luminary.

name: R Luminary Shards
description: Collect 60 Shards to summon an R Luminary.
